alert.note: Alert for Hartford (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A developing strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hartford, southwestern Hampshire and western Hampden Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 907 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Avon, or near Farmington, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail, along with localized downpours and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Downpours may cause ponding of water in areas where water does not drain well. Locations impacted include... Hartford, West Hartford, Westfield, Holyoke, Newington, Windsor, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Farmington, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Avon, Easthampton, Suffield, Windsor Locks, Granby, Canton, Southwick and Burlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
